hero.title: Sisitemu ya UniSmart yo Gufata Abitabiriye
hero.description: Hindura imicungire y'abitabiriye ishuri ukoresheje umuti wacu mushya.

digital.title: Gufata Abitabiriye mu Buryo bwa Dijitali
digital.description: Fata abitabiriye mu buryo bwa dijitali byoroshye

analytics.title: Isesengura
analytics.description: Sesengura amakuru y'abitabiriye kugirango uteze imbere imicungire y'ishuri

notifications.title: Imenyesha
notifications.description: Akira imenyesha ako kanya ku birebana n'abitabiriye

reports.title: Raporo
reports.description: Kora raporo zirambuye ku isesengura ry'abitabiriye

howItWorks.title: Uko Bikora
howItWorks.description: Menya uko sisitemu yacu ishobora kugufasha gucunga neza abitabiriye

step3.title: Intambwe 3: Fata abitabiriye mu buryo bwa dijitali
step3.description: Fata abitabiriye mu buryo bwa dijitali byoroshye

step4.title: Intambwe 4: Sesengura amakuru y'abitabiriye
step4.description: Sesengura amakuru y'abitabiriye kugirango uteze imbere imicungire y'ishuri

testimonials.title: Icyo Abakoresha Bavuga
testimonials.description: Umva abakoresha bacu bavuga uburambe bwabo kuri sisitemu yacu

1.name: Mugabo Jean
1.content: Iyi sisitemu yatumye gufata abitabiriye byoroha cyane. Sinongera kwihangayikisha kubura impapuro z'abitabiriye cyangwa guhangana n'ibitabo by'abitabiriye bitanoze.

contact.title: Twandikire
contact.description: Twandikire kugirango umenye byinshi kuri sisitemu yacu
contact.success: Ubuyoboka kuri twandikire! Tugabanye kuri twandikire
contact.name: Izina
